System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows Vista / 7/8
Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a clock speed of 2.4 GHz
RAM: 2 GB
Video: Radeon HD 3850 or GeForce 9600 GT, VRAM 512MB
Sound Card: desirable
Free space on hard disk: 6.6 GB

Game information:


Action 3 Risen takes place in a world abandoned by the gods,
war-torn Titans. You - a young warrior, without a soul dark ghosts.
Join the battle with the darkness that enveloped all around to get
back what you took away. Achieve location damned mages and make
them allies, you have to find the mysterious magicians Sanctuary
located on the island of lightning, Taranis. During the game you
have to join one of several guilds and choose their own path.
In the world of Risen 3: Titan Lords every decision affects
the course of history.


Repack Features:

Do not cut / no recoded;

Present DLC:

Misty Island DLC - ship, which sailed squad inquisitors ran
aground not far from the mysterious island. Help seekers
find new lands a terrible secret that blurred piece of land.

Rise of the shorties DLC - goblins and gnomes staged a battle
for supremacy on the Isle of Thieves. Save the dwarves and their
culture from certain destruction.

Clothing traveler DLC- this set of objects not only protect you
from the elements, but will defy the dangers of easily meet the
unknown desert and gloomy port taverns.

Installation time ~ 8 min
